casebody.data:
The People of the State of Illinois, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. David Brian Roper, Defendant-Appellant.(No. 54151;First DistrictMarch 22, 1971.Robert E. Cherry, and Bellows, Bellows & Magidson, of Chicago, for appellant.Edward V. Hanrahan, State’s Attorney, of Chicago, (Robert A. Novelle and Arthur L. Belkind, Assistant State’s Attorneys, of counsel,) for the People.

Rehearing denied July 12,1971.

Abstract of Decision

Opinion by Mr. JUSTICE GOLDBERG.
